parameter.description: Timeout for blocking network calls (in seconds). Use -1 for no timeout.

parameter.name: PacketTimeout
parameter.description: Timeout for each RDP packet.

parameter.name: MaxProcessCount
parameter.description: The maximum number of RDP process loops to allow

parameter.name: SendSpacebar
parameter.description: Whether to send spacebar to clear legal text caption or not

parameter.name: ProcessCountToSendSpaceOn
parameter.description: Process loop to clear the legal text caption on

parameter.name: MaxRDPLibErrorCount
parameter.description: Maximum number of RDPLib errors to allow

parameter.name: Architecture
parameter.description: Type of processor the target is running on

parameter.name: Target
parameter.description: Operating system and service pack of the target

parameter.name: EncryptionMethod
parameter.description: Encryption method the target is running

parameter.name: SmartCardAuth
parameter.description: If the target supports smart card authentication

parameter.name: RdpLibHertz
parameter.description: Extrapolated RdpLib processing cycles per second.

parameter.description: The contract fulfilled by this plugin
